ContentTask

Source: R/deploy.R
ContentTask.Rd

ContentTask

ContentTask

Details

An R6 class that represents a Task for a piece of Content

See also

Other R6 classes: Bundle, Content, Environment, PositConnect, Task, Vanity, VariantSchedule, VariantTask, Variant
